archimate:Folder.name: 7.2.2.3.1 NCSA Data Backbone File systems and ITC
archimate:Folder.documentation: Data backbone file systems are part fo a larger concept callled the data baclkbone. 1) Hierarchy -- data exists in a tape-disk hierarchy, 2) Active assessement and management -- files are continuously verified for integrity. 2) File creation by stage in only. 4) Files respres in external meta data. 5) Replication between base and NCSA per policy.
